headline: How Emerson Electric's (EMR) New Automation Contracts Could Shape Its Energy Transition Role
summary: In recent days, Emerson Electric announced multiple high-profile contracts to deploy its advanced automation and control solutions in large renewable energy and mining projects across the U.S., including a major solar site in Texas and significant lithium and zinc mining operations. These agreements underscore Emerson's increasing involvement in supplying digital and automation technologies that help enable the transition to clean energy and critical mineral production in North...
